newsitem.title: USA: US Diagnostic to expand debt up to $200 mln.
newsitem.headline: US Diagnostic to expand debt up to $200 mln.

text.p: US Diagnostic Inc said on Monday that it is in the process of expanding its senior credit facility, with a possible high yield debt, for up to $200 million.

"We are looking to do in the neighborhood of $100 million in the senior facility, with as much as another $100 million in high yield," a company executive said in a telephone conference call Monday morning.
The company said that the facility would not be completed until its year-end audit is complete.
